statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 68800. If she receives a raise of 2900 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-68800 = 31200. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{31200}}{{2900}}={10.758620689655} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 11 years.
